 The Mean Temperature of Feb for period 1869-2017  is 32.77
 The Mean Temperature of Aug for period 1869-2017 is 74.58
 The Mean Temperature of Annual Average for period 1869-2017 is 53.94


 The standard deviation of Feb in NYC for period 1869-2017 is 4.2570
 The standard deviation of Aug in NYC for period 1869-2017 is 2.2310
 The standard deviation of Annual Average for period 1869-2017 is 1.6873


 The median temp of Feb for period 1869-2017 is 34.6
 The median temp of Aug for period 1869-2017 is 75.9
 The median temp of Annual for period 1869-2017 is 53.7


 The Highest temp of Feb in NYC for period 1869-2017 is 41.6
 The Lowest temp of Feb in NYC for period 1869-2017 is 34.5
 The Highest temp of Aug in NYC for period 1869-2017 is 74.0
 The Lowest temp of Aug in NYC for period 1869-2017 is 71.8
 The Highest temp of Annual in NYC for period 1869-2017 is 56.3
 The Lowest temp of Annual in NYC for period 1869-2017 is 51.4


 Mode of Feb temperature for period 1869-2017 is 33.9
 Mode of Aug temperature for period 1869-2017 is 74.0
 Mode of Annual temperature for period 1869-2017 is 53.4
